title: Featured Excerpt: The Last Secret Agent
description: by Pippa Latour with Jude Dobson After decades of silence, the last surviving World War II spy operating in the deadly world of Nazi France, reveals the real, untold story of her time as a secret agent. Read on for a featured excerpt from The Last Secret Agent. FOREWORD  Pippa was much loved by the […] The post Featured Excerpt: The Last Secret Agent appeared first on The History Reader.
author: Sara Beth Haring
